summary: The Federal Emergency Management Agency maps flood hazard areas to help guide the National Flood Insurance Program and the flood mitigation efforts of property owners, community planners, insurers, and others. (The insurance program is on our High Risk List .) title: FEMA Flood Maps: Better Planning and Analysis Needed to Address Current and Future Flood Hazards
